local_intent: Translate the grasped cloth laterally along the x-axis by 0.1 m while ensuring the grasp remains stable.
assumptions: Cloth edge is already grasped and lifted with sufficient clearance
Workspace along +x direction is unobstructed for 0.1 m
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase: after a stable grasp, perform the lateral x-translation (0.1) and verify stability, matching the GLOBAL_BT MoveDelta(x,0.1) step toward folding.
